entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 7:55 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:55 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
